title: New: REID – Miami
content:
Another graduate of CitR’s Sound of 2012 list, Irish producer REID has well and truly cemented his name as one of the most exciting young artists around at the moment.

With half a dozen original tracks and remixes to his name, it’s not hard to fathom just why we predicted that this year would be vitally important to his career. New track Miami premiered via XLR8R earlier today continues in a similar vein to previous outings, slightly dark, understated dance music, perfect to soundtrack late night drives. Check out Miami below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
